videoSnippet.title: The #suggestion Miniature || Caruana vs Ding || St. Louis Rapid & Blitz GCT (2019)
videoSnippet.description:

Fabiano Caruana vs Ding Liren
GCT St. Louis Rapid & Blitz (2019) (blitz), St Louis, MO USA, rd 18, Aug-14 
Caro-Kann Defense: Exchange Variation (B13)

1. e4 c6 2. d4 d5 3. ed5 cd5 4. Bd3 Nc6 5. c3 Qc7 6. h3 Nf6 7. Na3 a6 8. Nc2 g6 9. Nf3 Bf5 10. Be2 e6 11. O-O h5 12. Nce1 Bd6 13. Nd3 Ne4 14. Be3 O-O-O 15. Rc1 g5 16. Ng5 Rdg8 17. f4 Ng3 18. Rf2 f6 19. Nf3 Ne4 20. Rf1 Bh3 21. Nfe1 h4 22. Kh2 Qg7 23. Bf3 Bg2 24. Bg2 Qg3 25. Kh1 Qe3 26. Rf3 h3

The Saint Louis Rapid and Blitz is the 4th stage of the 2019 Grand Chess Tour. The 10-player tournament takes place in the St. Louis Chess Club from 10-14 August. The prize fund is $150,000, with $37,500 for 1st place. 7 tour regulars, including World Champion Magnus Carlsen, are joined by wildcards Leinier Dominguez, Yu Yangyi and Richard Rapport.

The rapid section on the first 3 days is a single round-robin with a time control of 25 minutes for all moves and a 10-second delay from move 1. The final 2 days are a blitz double round-robin, with 18 rounds of 5+3 blitz. Rapid games count double, with 2 points for a win and 1 for a draw. A 2-player tie for first will be decided by a 2-game rapid mini-match (10+5) and, if necessary, an Armageddon game (5 vs. 4). Official website: grandchesstour.org

To those of you who read the description: You are an excellent subscriber! :)
